title: how come i get reported and banned TWICE for telling teammates to report our afk players?
body: In 2 weeks i have received reports to my account for telling the other people on my team to report the person who was afk for trolling sitting in fountain during a ranked game, and i end up getting reported by all of them since they were queued together and now my account has been banned. Is there any way out of this? And i don't want to hear the people complain oh you must have done something toxic or used inappropriate language, no i did not. In my reason for being banned all it said was toxic behavior there was no indication of foul language or going against the summoners code. Therefor i find this completely unreasonable and i would like to have a conversation with someone who works at riot about why my account out of all others is reported. If you read this thank you for taking the time to do so, I'm sure somewhere along the lines some of you will think I'm in the wrong but remember how you would feel and the things you would say if you were ranking and someone decides to troll for not getting the champ or role they wanted? Unfair right? just wish the system of punishing players was more reasonable then people spamming troll reports and riot slamming the ban hammer.
